hero.description: Help build safer, cleaner neighborhoods by reporting infrastructure issues. From potholes to broken streetlights, your voice matters.

featuresSection.title: Powerful Features for Better Communities
featuresSection.description: Everything you need to report, track, and resolve civic issues efficiently and effectively.

photo.title: Photo Documentation
photo.desc: Capture and upload high-quality images of infrastructure issues with automatic metadata tagging.

gps.title: GPS Location Tracking
gps.desc: Precise location capture using GPS coordinates ensures accurate issue positioning and faster response.

community.title: Community Engagement
community.desc: Connect with neighbors, track issue status, and see the impact of your reports on the community.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.desc: Get instant notifications about your reported issues and track resolution progress in real-time.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.desc: Comprehensive administrative tools for managing reports, assigning tasks, and monitoring city-wide issues.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.desc: Data-driven insights help administrators prioritize resources and track community improvement trends.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Reporting civic issues is simple and straightforward. Follow these four easy steps to make a difference.

capture.title: Capture the Issue
capture.desc: Take a clear photo of the infrastructure problem using your mobile device or camera.

location.title: Add Location Details
location.desc: GPS automatically captures the exact location, or manually adjust for precision.

submit.title: Submit Your Report
submit.desc: Add a brief description and submit your report to the appropriate authorities.

track.title: Track Progress
track.desc: Monitor the status of your report and receive updates when action is taken.

issueTypes.title: What Can You Report?
issueTypes.description: Our platform covers a wide range of civic issues to help keep your community safe and well-maintained.

road.title: Road Infrastructure
road.desc: Report potholes, damaged roads, broken sidewalks, and street maintenance issues.

waste.title: Waste Management
waste.desc: Report illegal dumping, overflowing bins, litter, and garbage collection issues.

environment.title: Environmental Issues
environment.desc: Report damaged trees, fallen branches, landscaping problems, and green space issues.

utilities.title: Utilities & Infrastructure
utilities.desc: Report water leaks, gas issues, electrical problems, and utility infrastructure concerns.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join thousands of engaged citizens working together to build safer, cleaner, and better communities. Your report can spark positive change.

forCitizens.title: For Citizens
forCitizens.desc: Report issues, track progress, and engage with your community

forAdmins.title: For Administrators
forAdmins.desc: Manage reports, coordinate responses, and track city-wide data

footer.description: Empowering communities to report and resolve civic issues through technology and civic engagement.
footer.copyright: ¬© 2024 CivicIssueRepoter. All rights reserved. Building better communities together.

table.caption: A list of all reported issues.
table.title: Title

citizen.subtitle: Help improve your community by reporting issues
citizen.noIssuesAvailable: No issues available at the moment.

auth.signInDescription: Access your account to report issues or manage community reports
auth.createAccountDescription: Join our community to report issues and help build better cities
